auth.title: Sign in to your account
auth.subtitle: Enter your email below to sign in to your account
auth.checkEmailDescription: We sent you a sign in link. Be sure to check your spam too.
auth.signInError: Failed to send sign in link
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.hint: Click the link in your email to securely sign in to your account.

bullets.expire: The link will expire in {hours} hours.
bullets.spam: Check your spam folder if you don't see it.
bullets.checkEmail: Make sure to check the email address you entered.

email.subject: Your magic link to sign in to {appName}
email.preview: Your magic link to sign in to {appName}
email.heading: Sign in to {appName}
email.description: Click the button below to securely sign in. This link will expire in 10 minutes.
email.fallbackText: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.expiry: This link will expire in {minutes} minutes for security reasons.
email.noReply: This is an automated email. Please do not reply to this message.

chatbot.title: Fivt Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Get personalized financial advice and strategies
chatbot.placeholder: Ask me about your financial goals, budgeting, investing, or any money-related questions...
chatbot.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Fivt assistant. How can I help you with your financial goals today?

home.title: Welcome to Fivt
home.subtitle: Your intelligent financial companion for better money management

ai.title: AI-Powered Advice
ai.description: Get personalized financial recommendations powered by advanced AI

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your financial data is encrypted and protected with industry-standard security

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Available in English, Vietnamese, and French for global accessibility

banking.title: Bank Connections
banking.subtitle: Connect your bank account to get personalized financial insights
banking.subtitle_powens: Connect your European bank account using Powens for personalized financial insights
banking.connectFirstAccount: Connect your first bank account to get started with financial insights.
banking.connectDescription: Securely connect your bank account to analyze your transactions and provide personalized financial advice.
banking.securityNote: Your banking information is encrypted and secure. We never store your login credentials.
banking.error: Failed to connect bank account. Please try again.
banking.bridgeDisclaimer: Banking services provided by Bridge API. Your data is protected by bank-level security.

powens.title: Powens Banking
powens.description: Connect to European banks with Powens secure banking platform

connection.popup_blocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this site.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description_powens: Powens uses bank-level security to protect your financial data

features.title: Banking Features
features.description_powens: Access comprehensive banking data with Powens integration

benefits.title: Financial Benefits
benefits.description_powens: Get insights from your banking data with Powens

errors.page_description: We encountered an issue while connecting to your bank account.

access_denied.title: Connection Cancelled
access_denied.description: You cancelled the bank connection process.
access_denied.suggestion: If you want to connect your bank account, please try again and complete the authorization process.

ssl_error.title: Secure Connection Error
ssl_error.description: There was a problem establishing a secure connection with the banking service.
ssl_error.suggestion: This often happens in development. Try refreshing the page or using a different browser. For production, ensure HTTPS is properly configured.

callback_failed.title: Connection Failed
callback_failed.description: We couldn't complete the bank connection due to a technical error.
callback_failed.suggestion: Please try connecting again. If the problem persists, contact support.

user_not_found.title: User Session Error
user_not_found.description: Your session expired during the connection process.
user_not_found.suggestion: Please log in again and try connecting your bank account.

fetch_failed.title: Data Retrieval Error
fetch_failed.description: We couldn't retrieve your account information from the bank.
fetch_failed.suggestion: This might be a temporary issue. Please try again in a few minutes.

popup_blocked.title: Popup Blocked
popup_blocked.description: Your browser blocked the banking connection popup.
popup_blocked.suggestion: Please allow popups for this site in your browser settings and try again.

unknown.title: Unknown Error
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred during the connection process.
unknown.suggestion: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support.

allow_popups.title: Enable Popups
allow_popups.description: Make sure popups are allowed for this website in your browser settings.

check_connection.title: Check Your Internet Connection
check_connection.description: Ensure you have a stable internet connection and try again.

try_different_browser.title: Try a Different Browser
try_different_browser.description: Some browsers handle banking connections better than others. Try Chrome, Firefox, or Safari.

transactions.name: Transaction
transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.subtitle: View your bank transactions from Powens for the selected month
transactions.manualSubtitle: Transactions you've created manually for tracking purposes
transactions.addManualSubtitle: Create a manual transaction record for tracking purposes
transactions.noTransactions: No transactions found for the selected date.
transactions.noManualTransactionsDesc: You haven't created any manual transactions yet.
transactions.noBankTransactionsDesc: No bank transactions were found for the selected month.
transactions.errorLoadingTransactions: Error loading transactions. Please try again.

category.errorLoadingCategories: Error loading categories. Please try again.

setup.title: Financial Profile Setup
setup.subtitle: Enter your financial information to calculate your personalized financial stage and get tailored recommendations.
setup.netIncomeDesc: Your income after taxes and deductions
setup.monthlyExpensesDesc: Include rent/mortgage, food, utilities, transportation, entertainment, etc.
setup.notesPlaceholder: e.g., Planning to buy a house, expecting salary increase, etc.

results.stageDescription: You are in the {stage} stage of your financial journey

stageDescriptions.survival: Focus on debt reduction and building an emergency fund.
stageDescriptions.stability: Great job building your emergency fund! Time to start investing.
stageDescriptions.growth: You're in the wealth-building phase. Stay consistent with investments.
stageDescriptions.freedom: You're close to financial independence! Consider your post-FI plans.
stageDescriptions.legacy: Congratulations on achieving FI! Consider tax-efficient giving strategies.

completion.title: Complete Your Financial Profile
completion.description: Set up your financial profile to get personalized insights, track your progress towards financial independence, and receive tailored recommendations.
